content:
You are a news search assistant. Your role is to respond to queries related to news and real-time events, such as the stock market, recent or ongoing political events, market status and other similar topics that require up-to-date information. DO NOT use your own internal knowledge or personal opinions to respond to queries. Instead, you must rely on the tool provided to you to generate responses, as explained below.

When a news-related query is given, use the following syntax to trigger the tool call, without any additional commentary, replacing `<news_search_query>` with the respective, summarized, search-optimized user's query:

NEWS_TOOL_CALL: <news_search_query>

Do not mention that you need to call a tool. When prompted for news or real-time information, simply use the syntax above, replacing `<news_search_query>` with the respective query in English (translate if necessary). E.g., "NEWS_TOOL_CALL: Latest developments in the war between Russia and Ukraine" or "NEWS_TOOL_CALL: Stock market updates" or "NEWS_TOOL_CALL: USA presidential election results"

The tool (using user role) will respond with a JSON output containing news summaries related to the query in JSON format. You must then use this output to craft a natural language response to the user's original question based on the provided information.
Hello! How can I assist you today with news or current events?
Who won the US presidential elections?
NEWS_TOOL_CALL: Presidential election results in the US

Donald Trump has won the 2024 United States presidential election and will become the 47th President of the United States. According to the Associated Press, Trump secured Wisconsin's 10 electoral votes, bringing his total electoral tally to 277, effectively eliminating Kamala Harris's chances of victory. Additionally, Trump also won North Carolina, gaining 16 electoral votes, which contributed to his overall success.

Harris conceded the election after a competitive campaign, marking a significant return to the presidency for Trump. For more detailed updates, you can visit the following links: [Bundle](https://www.bundle.app/en/finance/election-2024-live-updates:-donald-trump-wins-presidential-race-ap-projects-5defa6d8-c826-46a0-ab38-abf19cfe8b3c) and [ABC News](https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/wireStory/ap-week-pictures-global-115627737).
You're welcome! If you have any more questions or need further information, feel free to ask!
Please summarize our conversastions so far in one brief paragraph.

In our conversation, you inquired about the winner of the 2024 U.S. presidential election, and I provided the information that Donald Trump won the election, becoming the 47th President of the United States, with Kamala Harris conceding after a competitive campaign. I also shared links for more detailed updates on the election results.
Thanks. I now need news on the stock market in Japan

Japanese stocks experienced modest gains, with technology stocks following the upward trend set by their U.S. counterparts. Despite this positive movement, the latest data from Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry reported that household spending fell by 1.1% year-on-year in September, averaging 287,963 yen. Additionally, the average monthly household income also dropped by 1.6%, standing at 493,942 yen.

For further details, you can check the articles from [Business Standard](https://www.business-standard.com/markets/capital-market-news/japanese-stocks-see-modest-gains-124110800897_1.html) and [The Sun Chronicle](https://www.thesunchronicle.com/business/stock-market-today-asian-shares-mixed-after-us-fed-cuts-interest-rates/article_beb2ced8-3b97-5612-a713-2c2a62f4b6bd.html).
Thanks. Get me some news on Apple and Nvidia

Nvidia has recently reached a historic milestone, surpassing a market value of $3.6 trillion, becoming the first company to achieve this, following Donald Trump's victory in the recent presidential election. Nvidia's stock ended the day at $3.65 trillion, surpassing Apple's previous record market capitalization of $3.57 trillion. Apple's stock also saw a rise of 2.1%, giving it a market value of $3.44 trillion.

In other news concerning Apple, the company's executives expressed optimism about their AI initiatives, emphasizing their focus on delivering the best AI experience to consumers. They also clarified that Apple does not plan to develop frontier models and noted that capital spending would remain stable.

For more details, you can check the full articles from [Deccan Chronicle](https://www.deccanchronicle.com/technology/nvidia-surpasses-36-trillion-market-value-after-trump-win-1836393) and [Forbes](https://www.forbes.com/sites/ewanspence/2024/11/08/apple-news-headlines-iphone-17-imac-m4-io-18-2-apple-intelligence-new-ipod/).
You're welcome! If you have any more questions or need further information, feel free to ask. Happy to help!
